sentences.english: A number of investigators have used the fluorescent-antibody (FA) technique for Salmonella detection.
sentences.chinese: 因此，沙門氏菌檢測的熒光抗體技術爲能被廣範應用。

sentences.english: God knows that , and created us totally free.
sentences.chinese: 上主深明此理，因此將我們創造成了自由。

sentences.english: Therefore, the dissertation concentrates on the research of localization in WSNs.
sentences.chinese: 因此，本論文圍繞無線傳感器網絡定位技術展開研究。

sentences.english: So I decided to test the system.
sentences.chinese: 因此我決定測試下這個制度。

sentences.english: Therefore, how can I not love the warm wash carvedilol primary large group?
sentences.chinese: 因此，我怎能不愛洗洛小學這個溫暖的大集體？

sentences.english: Chihiro has thus been recognized by everyone to achieve their value.
sentences.chinese: 千尋也因此獲得衆人的認可，實現了自己的價值。

sentences.english: Consequently, you will find that almost every one owns either a watch or a clock.
sentences.chinese: 因此，你會發現幾乎每個人都擁有一隻表或一個鐘。

sentences.english: He always cheats others, thus none of us trust him.
sentences.chinese: 他經常唬人，因此大家都不信任他。
因此，混搭你自己的百搭果仁吧。

sentences.english: Ice is not as dense as water and it therefore floats.
sentences.chinese: 冰的密度比水小，因此能浮在水面上。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is necessary to improve the current navigation means of the subsonic vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 因此，有必要對亞音速飛行器的導航方案進行改進。

sentences.english: So let us seize it, not in fear,but in gladness.
sentences.chinese: 因此，讓我們毫無畏懼，滿心愉悅地把握命運。

sentences.english: Therefore, the study on port-city relation is extremely essential.
sentences.chinese: 因此，研究港城關係是十分必要的。

sentences.english: Q. So beware the tapping of the pen.
sentences.chinese: 因此要留意那支鋼筆的敲擊。

sentences.english: Therefore, you have to think of the possibility that this was one of the reasons for domesticating dogs.
sentences.chinese: 因此，你必須考慮這可能是馴化狗只的其中一個原因。

sentences.english: So I'm going to stay away from you for a few days."
sentences.chinese: 因此我要和你分開一段時間。”

definition: therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
due to/as a result of/thanks to/owing to/since/because
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
